Returns: True if the click was handled
Parameters: ExpandableListView: The ExpandableListView where the click happened
View: The view within the expandable list/ListView that was clicked
int: The group position that contains the child that was clicked
int: The child position within the group
long: The row id of the child that was clicked
onChildClick(android.widget.ExpandableLi.Description: Callback method to be invoked when a child in this expandable list has been clicked.
onChildClick(android.widget.ExpandableLi.FullName: public abstract boolean onChildClick (ExpandableListView parent, View v, int groupPosition, int childPosition, long id)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a child in this expandable list has been clicked.
